Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What talent! You've surprised me again.
You're a genius builder.
<PAGE>
Any other skills you might like to tell
me about?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No need to be so modest. The proof of
your abilities is standing right here!
<PAGE>
Right, now things are really getting
interesting! You may actually be the
one to save our town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next you need some household furniture.
Actually, when we heard you were coming
we all started to collect some together.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
They're waiting nearby so let's get 'em
inside the house. Give me a hand,
<MYNAME>.

<MYNAME>, you get that side. Here we
go, and... lift!

Okay, this refrigerator goes over there.
Let's put the storage over here. Careful
not to drop it!

Hmmm, let's see...
<PAGE>
I think that covers it. Great work,
<MYNAME>.
